TextBody:
Hello Korepu Akhil,

The following is a summary of the ticket for your records.

Symptom
Client with multiple domains set up APIs for the reports, but the forest for four domains is not displaying correctly. Only one child domain is connected to the parent, while the other domains have no parent domain.

Cause
Outdated version of PC

Resolution
Upgrading to the latest version to see if this works

Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!

Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead

Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749
